abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines successful acquisition of Cuban prospect Yoan Moncada by Boston Red Sox, in which team outbid New York Yankees by $13 million; notes that competition was even more intense due to penalties for exceeding international spending limit and collective bargaining agreement that will block Yankees from shopping on the international market for the next two years.
lead_paragraph: Seeking the services of Yoan Moncada, 19, Boston outbid the Yankees, who were hamstrung after they pillaged the international market last July.

headline.main: Red Sox Place a Big Bet on the Latest Prospect From Cuba
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Place Big Bet on Latest Cuban Prospect

snippet: Seeking the services of Yoan Moncada, 19, Boston outbid the Yankees, who were hamstrung after they pillaged the international market last July.
